browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/32.0.1700.76 Safari/537.36

visible_files.cyber-dojo.sh:
gmcs -t:library -r:nunit.framework.dll -out:RunTests.dll *.cs
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  nunit-console -nologo RunTests.dll
fi
visible_files.instructions:
Write a function that returns true or false depending on 
whether its input integer is a leap year or not.

A leap year is defined as one that is divisible by 4,
but is not otherwise divisible by 100 unless it is
also divisible by 400.

For example, 2001 is a typical common year and 1996
is a typical leap year, whereas 1900 is an atypical
common year and 2000 is an atypical leap year.
